page.title: 20BRIDGE OF WEIR - RELIGION 2
page.content: On this page we show the statistics of the{four}churches in{Bridge of Weir. Attendance Membership {__________ __________ {Freeland }180-200 545 {St.Machar's }250 813 {St.Mary's }30 140 {Hope hall }50 46 Organisations in village life that are church based are : {Boy's Brigade }2 companies{(91+80=171) {Girl's Brigade }1 company{(38) {Girl Guides} 2 companies{(36+24=60) {Brownies }2 packs{(28+23=51) {Youth Club }1{(71) {Womans' Groups }6 {Mens' Groups }2 {Mixed Young Adults Group }1 {Playgroups}3 Domesday Disc compiled by{Pr.7 pupils {Bridge of Weir Primary School}as part of their work during the summer term.
